name: Kojin v2.0 Demo
description:
This project is made by Game Development students of Positivo University, Curitiba, Brazil.
This is an early stage game prototype, so we hope to get as much Feedback as we can from the community. Thank you!

If you guys could answersome questions, we appreciate it!

https://goo.gl/forms/E5pLfAA0U... (ENG - Form)

https://goo.gl/forms/6CQdlV77G... (PT - Formulário)

Kojin is a walking exploration horror game were you have to find out what happened in this family house.

WASD - to move around

CTRL - to crouch

Left Mouse Button - to Interact with objects

Right Mouse Button - to Zoom in and out

F - Flashlight

Guardians Entertainment . 2017
